column4: yeah deffo no error messages first couple of times looked as if it was working fine
and now it keeps redirecting me to windows setup upon boot
2min i try another machine have like 10 around me at the moment :|
holding shigt its not doing anything still going into windows setup
mmm i have bios av protection enabled if i remember rightly
none apart from windows setup failed on some file whcih i cant rememer atm as in bios
virus warning is disabled in bios :S
anthing else in bios which could cause this to happen?
bios Av protection - prevents writing to the MBR i belive. or restores the mbr if it changes. so you really dont want that enabled
why are you using the server cd? the desktop cd can  provide services also
you can image the iso file straight to the flash. no extra tools. it does limit what else you can do with the flash. but its the most foolproof way.
in windows theres some imageing tools that can image teh iso straight to flash. You might need to rename the isoo to whatever.img for some of them to work
i may  have one bookmarked at delicious.com/dr_willis
if you are getting read/write/io errors - then  theres issues..
id just get a working desktop install going. ;)
